It implements a reconciliation model allowing for duplication, transfer, and loss (DTL) of genes to estimate joint likelihoods and infer reconciled gene trees.

It leverages Foldseek and ProstT5 to utilize protein structure information for phylogenetic inference, offering an alternative to sequence-based methods for deep evolutionary relationships.
